org.teamfarce.mirch.screens

Class JournalScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.AbstractScreen
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.JournalScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class JournalScreen
extends AbstractScreen
    The journal screen draws the Journal GUI to the screen and handles any inputs whilst the journal is displayed

        Parameters:
        pageTitle - Defines the button text
        linkState - Defines which GameState the button should navigate to
        position - Defines the position of button, use the index of button in order
        Returns:
        TextButton with appropriate event handlers, position and style
